participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, Emma enjoys exploring new games and connecting with others online.
participant_1.background: I'm a 12-year-old girl. I love to play pobox. I have blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. I hate school. I do not have many friends.
